intro: Chasme, commonly known as the chasmal plant, is a rare species of flowering plant found in specific alpine regions. It belongs to the genus Chasmanthium, which is part of the grass family, Poaceae. The plant is characterized by its slender, grass-like stems and small, clustered inflorescences. Due to its limited habitat, it is considered an endangered species and is of particular interest to botanists and conservationists.
